caption.p: Overview of the molecular landscape of PD. The four main biological processes in the PD landscape—oxidative stress response (Fig. 1a), endosomal-lysosomal functioning (Fig. 1b), endoplasmic reticulum ( ER) stress response (Fig. 1c), and neuron death and immune response (Fig. 1d)—are depicted. ECM extracellular matrix, ER endoplasmic reticulum, UPR unfolded protein response
